TableSpec.Name: ANNOTATIONE607DCD82D214918A0445597DF53A403
TableSpec.Description: Auto-generated table for Sponsorship Opportunity Note annotations.
TableSpec.Author: Blackbaud Product Development

Trigger.Name: TR_ANNOTATIONE607DCD82D214918A0445597DF53A403_T2BDELETE
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL: create trigger TR_ANNOTATIONE607DCD82D214918A0445597DF53A403_T2BDELETE on dbo.ANNOTATIONE607DCD82D214918A0445597DF53A403 after delete not for replication as begin -- TAIntegration data sync if dbo.UFN_B2T_CONTEXTISSYNC() = 1 update dbo.B2TROWS set SYNCSTATUSCODE = 11 where BBECID in(select ID from DELETED) and BBECTABLE = (select BBECTABLE from dbo.B2TTABLES where ATTRIBUTETABLE = 'ANNOTATIONE607DCD82D214918A0445597DF53A403') end
